citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1 pm on January 26,
2023. The inspector was informed by a family member that the licensee was away from the facility and would not be
available until after 5 pm. No other authorized person was available for inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1 pm on January 26, 
2023. The inspector was informed by a family member that the licensee was away from the facility and would not be 
available until after 5 pm. No other authorized person was available for inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
